localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
blogPost.body: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
blogPost.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
blogPost.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 36 days in a row, now down over 52% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/ypYfB3EqoR

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续36天下降，目前已从1月6日的高峰期下降了52%以上。🙏 https://t.co/ypYfB3EqoR。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續36天下降，目前已從1月6日的高峯期下降了52%以上。🙏 https://t.co/ypYfB3EqoR。

next.excerpt: Writer is beautiful, secure and fast text editor and notes app for iPhone, iPad and soon for Mac and Apple Watch. It has many features like Markdown support, syncing between devices via secure Apple Cloud, customizable typography and more...
next.title: Writer - Beautiful, fast, Apple native notes app with Markdown

localize.description: Writer是一款美观、安全、快速的文本编辑和笔记应用，适用于iPhone、iPad，不久还适用于Mac和Apple Watch。它有许多功能，如Markdown支持，通过安全的Apple Cloud在设备之间同步，可定制的排版等等。
localize.tagline: 美丽、快速、带Markdown的苹果原生笔记应用。

localize.description: Writer是一款美觀、安全、快速的文本編輯和筆記應用，適用於iPhone、iPad，不久還適用於Mac和Apple Watch。它有許多功能，如Markdown支持，通過安全的Apple Cloud在設備之間同步，可定製的排版等等。
localize.tagline: 美麗、快速、帶Markdown的蘋果原生筆記應用。
